title: hakabit
author: hakabit
content: Hello !As we know, modern days there are either mined or stable cryptocurrency.Mined example - bitcoin, stable example - binance coin.Disadvanatge of mined currency is that - it is volatilic and exchange ratio to USD can drop-raise tens of percents per day.Disadvanatge of stable currency is that - it is centralized and central authority can block any wallet due to any reason.There are attempts to create mined'n'stable currency, but in fact all of them are centralized.I have idea how to create mined'n'stable cryptocurrency. It will be 100% de-centralized.Only one disadvantage I see - it will be low currency supply.If sha-256 used and all-all bitcoin miners are used, then per day there will be only +-40mln. USD supply.I am interested to hear, will such currency be interesting to public ?!...
